description:
Despite interference from Aoi, Idate continues his run. Idate still trusts no one, and it`s revealed that during the Chunin Exams, Idate`s older brother was the proctor who posed the tenth question.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Fierce Battle of Rolling Thunder!
Aoi und das Schwert des Donnergottes
Juste avant l`arrivée, la bataille fait rage...
การต่อสู้อันดุเดือดก่อนเส้นชัย
ゴール直前! 雷鳴とどろく大激闘
